website_summaries.verdict: This pair comes with a full-panel waistband and extra stretch for superior comfort. A solid choice if you need something that would work for any occasion.
pros: We love how this brand caters to different body types with a vast selection of sizes
A dark wash makes them versatile enough for work and leisure
cons: Relaxed fit can feel a little loose if you're used to tight jeans

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable maternity pants for short ladies (petite size is rare to find)
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2 so I got the dark wash medium petite. I am 135 lbs, 14 weeks pregnant (twins). It fits nicely, a little loose but stays on. I also dislike super tight clothes right now. I am anticipating getting pretty large so I'm hoping this will work as that happens. The band right now is soft and not tight, but fits and its stretchy so I can guess it'll expand just fine. The band goes above my belly button. The jeans are real jeans material (not the jeggings material) but they are very stretchy and comfortable. I took some photos. I've tried a few other pairs I didnt like but I like these a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliya

customer_reviews.title: By far the best maternity jeans!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I honestly was not expecting much when I ordered these... but wow. These are by far the best maternity jeans I’ve ever owned. ( 5th pregnancy veteran here ) I’m 5’4 and usually wear a size 8. The medium is a perfect fit! The material is high quality and the belly band is very soft, and does not dig or rub my skin harshly at the top as other do. Also very form fitting, aka no saggy butt! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these since Christmas when I could still fit into my regular jeans with a hair tie, but these were so much more comfortable I haven't looked back. They are barely less comfortable than pajama pants and I'm 23 weeks now and still have plenty of room left. I wish my regular jeans fit my non-pregnant body this well! The main reason I bought this particular pair was the straight cut of the leg - seems like everything for sale is either skinny leg or bootcut. They are exactly what I wanted; not too tight, not too much of a flare at the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: L. D.

customer_reviews.title: Not MM brand but I love em!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found these! Not MM brand - they're marked Indigo Blue. But I like them! Soft with a nice stretch and less than 75% cotton so I expect they won't shrink. Good fit - M for me - I'm 5'5", 150ish, 23 wks. Belly panel isn't too tight and feels soft and stretchy. Good length, reaches just past my heels barefoot. Calf is perfect shape, narrow but not tight like skinnies so less of a struggle to get on, and more my style. The dark wash is a nice color though not the darkest, more of a medium-dark.
customer_reviews.author: S. babcock

customer_reviews.title: Good maternity pants
customer_reviews.text: These pants fit great and look nice. I am 5'2" and 143lbs at 5 months pregnant. I ordered the Large and they fit perfectly. I really like the look. The belly band is high on my ribs and comfortable. Unlike the older version, the band on these does sort of fray. Every time I wash them I have to cut strings off. I bought another pair of Motherhood Maternity pants in the store itself and they do the same thing, so it's a brand quality change. The pants I have from a previous pregnancy don't fray. Despite this, I would buy them again because of the look and fit.
customer_reviews.author: LoganMama

customer_reviews.title: Great maternity jeans
customer_reviews.text: I am skeptical about ordering jeans online because it is so hard to find the right fit. But these turned out great! Love the wash and the fit - they are true straight leg, fitted on the thigh and loose on the calf. I am 5’2 and currently 22 weeks and 136 lbs, ordered a medium. They are form fitting but not snug, so I still have some room to grow and am hopeful they will last my entire pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: They belly band does not come up high enough for my liking. I do have a longish torso, but don't have this issue with other maternity pants. Also they stretch out enough after 1 wear that I have to wash and dry them. I love to get a couple of wears at least out of jeans, but not happening with these. I like the length and they look good, so not a total bust especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: lizinvt

customer_reviews.title: Great maternity jeans for comfort and everyday wear.
customer_reviews.text: Get maternity jeans for a growing belly. Bought my first pair at about 16 weeks and liked them so much, I bought a second pair at 20 weeks. Plenty of stretch for growth but stays up without a belt during the earlier stages. Great length, good ankle width for going around boots or running shoes, but not super loose and wide either. A slight mom butt, but I guess I should start getting used to that. Comfy, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These fit wonderfully. I'm not pregnant but have have the apple shape. Most of my pants get pushed down under my fat. My butt and thighs are btwn 16 and 18 size but my gutt is 20-22 or more. I'm 5'8" 240 lbs. I thought I'd try some maternity jeans for a better feel and look and really like these. Don't know yet if they will ride down due to the leggings type fit but I think they won't.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Super stretchy and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric of the jeans are so stretchy. I love them. The straight leg Has room and is not a skinny cut, which is what I want. I can roll up for Capri length, and it’s perfect. I usually prefer under belly styles of maternity pants, and have been wearing these with the band folded down. They fall down a lot this way, but I think it will get better as baby grows (I’m around 17 weeks). I am trying them with the band unfolded and up high on my belly and they are more comfortable than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like these jeans a lot. I am a size 6 pre pregnancy. I got the medium. I feel like due to the pull up design it's a little tight to pull them up around my thighs but once they are on they are very comfortable. Even though they are tight I find I do have to pull up the buttocks and thigh area a couple times in the evening. overall fine enough for pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the price. I would buy again. Sizing chart was accurate. The only thing I’d change is to make the jean material go a few inches higher at the waist. But would definitely buy again! I usually buy Old Navy straight leg jeans in a 12 shirt and I bought these in a large.
customer_reviews.author: ROHA

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with these. I had bought the target maternity jeans and was in a personal hell for months before I finally gave in and bought another brand. I needed longer than average pant legs and these are perfect. I don't notice any smell contrary to what others have said... maybe they fixed that? I have super smell being 6 months pregnant, and other than smelling like a new pair of jeans, they're fine. The material feels much better than my target ones; these are a softer jean material and not a stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Indyroo

customer_reviews.title: These are baggy and wrinkled looking
customer_reviews.text: Just to be clear, I ordered these jeans as I loved their other full length terry maternity pants. But these are nothing like them. I have a booty and these are baggy in the butt. I normally wear a size 14 pre pregnancy and ordered and XL. I don't think down sizing will be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for tall girls
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! I’m 5’11 and it’s been a struggle to find maternity pants that would be long enough for me and also comfortable. I am 5 months pregnant and usually wear size 6. I got size medium/long and I love it. Material is stretchy but also thick like regular jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Best Maternity Pants, Cute and Fit Great!
customer_reviews.text: Best maternity pants! Most I order are always slightly too small, but these fit great! Ordered a large as a 4'10" petite woman, 4 months pregnant. Very happy with my purchase. Also love that they don't grip your ankles like most pants I find. Better looking on my pear shape body type.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the wash of the jeans and how comfortable they were. I did not like the odor of the jeans. I understand that some chemicals used in dying jeans often leave behind a strange residual smell. However, I am hoping the smell will go away after a few washes. The jeans fit too well for me to choose to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I loved how these pants fit, however all the pockets are not functional and I need pockets for work so I did end up returning them. If I wasnt buying them just for work I definitly would have kept them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! It wasnt as expensive as most of the similar blue jeans Iv seen and it doesnt look like maternity pants. The only thing I wasnt crazy about was that the ankle didnt have as "skinny" a cut as I would have liked but it wasnt advetisied as such. It looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not pregnant, just fat :)
customer_reviews.text: Short + extra 50lbs (mostly on my tummy) = impossible to find pants!! Fitb out of the package. Thinner material than expected, but should be good for summer wear. Barely fits my bottom, which is generally larger, even compared to ladies of my size. So nice to have a pair of jeans that do not cut off circulation!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell from the belly band
customer_reviews.text: Strong chemical smell of the belly band. Ruined my entire load of laundry. Too bad it already passed the return Window
customer_reviews.author: Y. Xing

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfy, perfect length. My only complaint is the belly band will not stay up, it constantly rolls down. Its also not a very supportive band so I just wear a better one over it
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Hard to keep up, no front pockets
customer_reviews.text: No front pockets so hard to pull up when they slide down. Don’t stay up well so I’m pretty constantly pulling them up. They do fit the way other jeans do so it’s not a size thing. Also no belt loops.
customer_reviews.author: SV3487

customer_reviews.title: Super low quality waist band
customer_reviews.text: The pants part of these jeans is awesome and super comfortable, but the elastic unraveled after only a month or two of wear. I bought a pair of boots cut maternity jeans at Target for about the same price, and they are MUCH higher quality. Would pass on these unless the alternative was nudity
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my niece who is having twins! Fit is great, purchased pre-pregnancy size. Very comfortable and fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: CjBurch

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy maternity jeans
customer_reviews.text: These fit easy and not too slim. Definitely recommend. Fits as nicely as many of the more expensive brands from maternity stores.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect maternity jeans
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and comfortable. I liked these so much that I ordered another pair.
customer_reviews.author: nator9882

customer_reviews.title: The perfect maternity jeans!
customer_reviews.text: Love them so much I just ordered a second pair. I’m usually a 12-14 and bought a large. Could not be happier with the fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Anisha Hopkinson

customer_reviews.title: Totally in love with these!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love them! For great! I like them so much I’m wondering if after the pregnancy I can cut off the belly band and wear as regular jeans lol
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: Love these jeans
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, fitted but stretchy. Look like normal jeans. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: 5ft 137lbs got a medium and fits right with room to grow my little bump
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t stay up
customer_reviews.text: These fit well when you first put them on but they slide down all day. I am 26 weeks pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, no color transfer, nice belly panel, but fake pockets
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and the dye does not run or rub off. I took off 1 star due to fake pockets. Why do all maternity clothes have fake pockets?
customer_reviews.author: AmandaE

customer_reviews.title: Great maternity jeans
customer_reviews.text: These are great maternity pants. I am 5’ and the XS petite pants are a little longer than I’d like but not too long that I can’t walk (I can rarely find pants that fit perfectly anyway). They are comfortable and have a nice stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W.

customer_reviews.title: No front pockets
customer_reviews.text: Pants are comfortable and fit well. However any positives at all are negated because there are no front pockets. Want to know how to make a hormonal pregnant woman more angry? Have her waste money on useless maternity jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and worth buying
customer_reviews.text: These were bigger than I anticipated, I still have a few months to go but they're pretty baggy and a little long. Good quality for the cost and definitely comfortable. Overall glad I got them
customer_reviews.author: abigail

customer_reviews.title: Nice jeans, but a little big
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5", 120 lbs, and I got a medium. The fit is pretty good except that I definitely have to keep pulling the belly band up, and these pants for sure don't do anything for my butt. Very comfortable, a good relief from the tightness of normal jeans! Really starting to show now so I'm grateful to have these.
customer_reviews.author: Shad

customer_reviews.title: consider sizing up
customer_reviews.text: Love the length and cut but should have sized up. (I'm all belly and my pre-pregnancy size is tight in the thigh)
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey T Young

customer_reviews.title: My favorite maternity jeans
customer_reviews.text: My favorite maternity jeans. Just stretchy enough and very comfortable and stylish. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Great jeans
customer_reviews.text: I love these jeans. Besides the belly band you can’t even tell they’re maternity jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Michelle VanMatre

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: These have a tendency to slip down. The band is not super supportive. But they are cute and I think worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great jeans!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these jeans. They are perfect fit for maternity jeans!
customer_reviews.author: Portia

customer_reviews.title: Best maternity jeans
customer_reviews.text: These are the best maternity jeans, and have fit me from the beginning of the second trimester all the way into the third. The belly band does not cut into my belly like other, more expensive maternity jeans, and they always stay up. They did smell a little strong out of the package, but were fine after two washes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pants run big, long
customer_reviews.text: I am 5ft and 112 lbs. with a rapidly growing belly. I assumed a size XS petite would fit better but the pants were extremely long and loosely fitted. I've got some thick thighs and most pants are tight in that area for me but these were extremely baggy (all over).
customer_reviews.author: Kate Cabell

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfy and they are the perfect length for my short legs. It's so nice having real jeans to wear during pregnancy, highly recommend to other petite ladies out there.
customer_reviews.author: lilmissjess

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I weigh normally 140#, so far 151# at 24 weeks pregnant and the medium fit perfectly. I try and get multiple days use out of them but they do get a little saggy after a days wear.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: The jean material was nice, but they didn’t come up high enough in the back. Made about a size small (in regards to chart). Ordered the large, and wear a size 12 jean...and was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Banks

customer_reviews.title: Soft, stretchy, and don’t sag.
customer_reviews.text: These are great maternity jeans! So glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Wade Floyd

customer_reviews.title: confortable jeans
customer_reviews.text: easy to wash and low maintenance fit as expected but to long for my mother
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the pants in general, but the belly band ripped really easily when I was pulling my pants up. It tore right at the pant line where it is sewn on. Other than that, they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Josh dalton

customer_reviews.title: You can wash these without them tearing!
customer_reviews.text: Best maternity pants that I have that hold up in the washing machine! I'm 5'4 140lbs and ordered a medium at 23 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Malone

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wore these pants 2 times and they already ripped. If you order these, be cautious of the band as it cant take any tugging. They are comfortable, but not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent experience but had to get the L instead of M.
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 10 so I got medium size but had to exchange it for a large one because it was a lil tight but I like the product and specifically its comfortable material.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Loved!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these pants! Only thing is I ordered a long however a regular would have been fine, I’m 5,7. Besides that these are great for work, casual wear, anything really!
customer_reviews.author: Perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these pants! Pockets in the front and back and also has belt loops.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Comfy maternity pant and perfect fit petite
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a perfect size 10 petite only for maternity. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: They run small
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is horrible. I had to return them. They run small
customer_reviews.author: Damita

customer_reviews.title: however they were more like skinny straight cut
customer_reviews.text: The jeans are definitely straight cut, however they were more like skinny straight cut, and not something that looked good on me. Return was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Megmuffin2002

customer_reviews.title: Great jeans, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly! I am 5 months pregnant and they fit true to pre-pregnancy size.
customer_reviews.author: Losmorales

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my niece who is 12 weeks pregnant. She says they fit just perfect for her and that her regular jeans hurt her stomach. It should be noted that she is 5’9 and even though they fit her now, I anticipate having to purchase these later in a long. She’s happy so I’m happy
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Lewis

product_meta.title: Motherhood Maternity Women's Maternity Indigo Blue Stretch Secret Fit Belly Straight Jean
product_meta.description: Full length straight jean with functioning back pocket and secret fit belly - (r) us patent nos. re43563, re43531, 7814575, and 7900276
feature_bullets: Super stretchy jeans great for casual every day wear or dressing them up with a blouse or blazer to go out to dinner
Motherhood's exclusive secret fit belly - (r) us patent nos. re43563, re43531, 7814575, and 7900276 is a seamless stretch maternity panel that grows with you throughout your pregnancy
Full length straight jean with 28.5 inch inseam and functioning back pocket
Stretch, relaxed fabric for a comfortable and flattering fit all day long
Please click on our Motherhood Maternity Logo above to shop our brand
